alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 27 at 3:39PM MST until August 27 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 338 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near San Tan Village Mall to near Chandler City Hall to near Chandler Fashion Center Mall to 7 miles south of South Mountain Park, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than two miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 147 and 165. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 199. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 198. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Granite Reef Dam, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community and South Phoenix. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
